EmailTemplate.description: Email template for customer attended for FMF
EmailTemplate.name: FMF_Customers Attended_1
EmailTemplate.subject: Great to see you again, {!Contact.FirstName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for for visting BehrPro at the 2013 Federación Mexicana de Fútbol Asociación event in Phoenix. Here is an overview of some of the color services we can offer {!Account.Contact_Name__c}. Please call me at {!Account.OwnerPhone} for info on BEHR® and KILZ® products or professional color services.
Let Us Help You Simplify The Color Process. Download PDF Brochure at www.behrpro.com/fmfcolorservices
Expert Color Recommendations Custom Color Renderings Pinpoint Color Matching Drawdown Samples Other Customized Color Support Tools
Help Your Customers Make Color Decisions Faster Download our ColorSmart by BEHRapp directly from www.behrpro.com/fmfcolorsmartmobile on your iPhone®, iPod touch® , iPad® or Android mobile device, or view the Web version at www.behrpro.com/fmfexplorecolornow
Sincerely, {!Account.OwnerFullName} {!Account.OwnerTitle} {!Account.OwnerPhone} {!Account.OwnerEmail}
You have opted-in to receive email newsletters from BehrPro. If you no longer wish to receive promotional notifications and news, please send us an email at unsubscribe@pronews.behrpro.com
If this email has been forwarded to you and you wish to subscribe, please send us an email at subscribe@pronews.behrpro.com
To read our Privacy Policy go to www.behrpro.com/privacypolicy
We recently updated our Privacy Policy. If you wish to change your preferences, please follow the directions in the Privacy Policy.
Trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
